Package layouttree

Class LayoutNode

java.lang.Object
layouttree.Layout
layouttree.LayoutNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HorizontalLayoutNode, VerticalLayoutNode
public abstract class LayoutNode extends Layout

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    LayoutNode.Orientation
    Enumerator that represents whether the Layouts inside this Layout will be stacked (VERTICAL) or side-by-side (HORIZONTAL)

    • rotateRelationshipNeighbor

      public Layout rotateRelationshipNeighbor(ROT_DIRECTION rot_dir) throws RuntimeException
      Rotates the active layoutLeaf under this structure if there is one with its right neighbor if there is one, clockwise or counterclockwise according to rotdir. If the right neighbor is a direct sibling it rotates to stand perpendicular to the current orientation of the parent. If there is no direct right sibling it is added to the parent of the active leaf and rotated then.
      Specified by:
      rotateRelationshipNeighbor in class Layout
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

      Deletes the right neighbour of this tree

    • deleteLeftLeaf

      protected void deleteLeftLeaf()
      Checks if parameter layout is of type LayoutNode, and if the children match the layout of this node. All leaves must have a FileBuffer containing the same path. ! Assumes the children are always put in the same sequence upon creation of layout
      Specified by:
      deleteLeftLeaf in class Layout
